pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extract Centerline from Closed Polygons // Generates skeletons of closed 2D polygons using Voronoi diagrams. It provides methods for 'sf', 'terra', and 'geos' objects to compute polygon centerlines based on the generated skeletons. Voronoi, G. (1908) doi:10.1515/crll.1908.134.198.
